Subject: New custom robots honoring policy
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=164438524; y=dS5AMsJQxtqow00DouoxQUrwHZPUvYlNi7jQFgfq73O2zQw
X-Yahoo-Profile: lrclause

We're considering doing a specific robots honoring policy that I don't
think is covered by the current ones.  However, the docs are not quite
clear on what the current policies do in some cases, so I'll check here
first.  We want to follow robots.txt in the cases where it specifically
mentions us in the user-agent field, but not follow it when a broader
user-agent (typically *) matches.  As I understand the most-favored and
most-favored-set policies, they will still obey a * user-agent if
nothing else is set, is that correct?

Thanks,
-Lars Clausen
